chart.ds: select month_id, sum(KPI_VALUE) value, c.kpi_code, c.kpi_desc, '#' kpi_fmt from dm_kpi_w_card_pandect_m t, dmcode_kpi_lib c where c.kpi_code = t.kpi_code and c.kpi_code in ('A0001', 'A0002') and month_id between '201002' and '201010' group by c.kpi_code, c.kpi_desc,month_id order by c.kpi_code, month_id

crossReport.ds: select t.MONTH_ID, b.pro_no, b.pro_name, b.ord, sum(A0001) A0001, sum(A0002) A0002 from dm_kpi_w_card_pandect_m2 t, dmcode_province b where t.prov_id = b.pro_no and month_id between '201101' and '201104' group by t.MONTH_ID, b.pro_no, b.pro_name, b.ord order by t.MONTH_ID desc, b.ord
